Posts.Content: Mar 20, 2009 06:07PM Bee54 wrote: Hi girls, Glad everyone sounds good. Well, I went to  PS and first she talked to us about me getting my eyelids done at the same time as she puts in the implants, this is something I really want to do, the doc is going to try to get the insuance comp. to pay for it but they probably won't, they will say they are not bad enough and to wait till they are..oh poop..lol But good news is I think my DH is going to pay for it, he says I've been through so much that I deserve it....isn't he just the sweetest? ( or maybe he's tired of seeing my drooping eyelids...lol no really, he would never think like that). then we went in the room for my fill, she did the right one, put in another 100ccs, so total in right 350ccs, well when she got to the left, remember the pains I had in it? Seems my expander flipped over, so she couldn't put any in that one, it's still 250ccs, I'm lopsided now...lol. PS did try to flip it today, she worked on it for quite a while, but couldn't do it, so I go back next wed., hopefully it will flip on it's own this week but if not she's gonna try again and if that don't work, I have to have surgery, so she can flip it. She also said that she would catch it up on the fills while I was in surgery. And I thought that I was doing so good....lol Oh well, I don't think it's any big deal, specially if it doesn't slow everything down..lol I know what your thinking 2new1s, yes she said it could of been caused from lifting my DG too much ( thought I'd say it before you did...lol ) Other than that, we ate at the Cheesecake Factory and yes I ate my delicious lunch and then had a wonderful piece of cheese cake, carrot cake cheese cake, It is sooooo good, ( I need that like I need another hole in my head,,,lol) But I just couldn't pass it up....I'm sooooo weak when it comes to sweets !!!!! my560sel, I found in early june last year about mine and didn't make my mind up till Nov, then had 2 lumpectomies and then waited till Feb. this year for my bi-lateral masectomy, talk about being slow..lol I'm so bad about making my mind up on anything, so something this serious is even harder for me. Just try to make your mind up somewhat faster than I did, cause I just had DCIS and LCIS. i'll be praying for you,....Hugs to you, and to all my little buddies Everyone take care Bee

Posts.Content: Apr 23, 2009 07:18AM Bee54 wrote: Hi all, Sorry so slow getting back on here. You'll never guess what happened the day of surgery, we leave at 6:30 a.m., head to Indy, get there we sign in, they take me to a room. I get undressed and put beautiful gown on, hat, those long white socks, I have an antibiotic iv in, I'm all ready to go, of course the PS is running late, about 45 minutes. She get's there and comes in to see me and mark my foob for where she  will make the incision. I make a joke and say that with my luck the expander flipped back and the other flipped over wrong..lol Well the doc decided to check the flipped foob out and lo and behold the expander had flipped back on it's own..lol She filled me, 150ccs in the flipped foob and just 50 in the other but they are both the same size now (400ccs), I think. So, I put my panties on and left...lol I was so happy, I just hated the thought of having another surgery. My DH and I just made a day of it, went to big antique store and looked around for along time, went to eat at a nice resturant, then headed west to Illinois to pick our DG's B'day/ easter pictures, they all turned out so great. We are very happy with them.Ended up going to Bath & Body so I could pick up somethings I need and some I didn't...lol We ended eating again before we went home, it was quite a long day. DD was at Greencastle at the Academic Bowl, competing for her school, so we had plenty of time to kill. Oh, one more thing that thrills me is, DD got invitated to join the National Honor Society, she is so happy, only 3 sophmores got invited. I'm very proud of her, good thing she took after her  dad, cause if it was mom, she'd be getting an award for good partying...lol 2new1s.....Sorry to hear about your trouble with your 16 year old son, my son is 26 and we are having alot of trouble with him, so I know how hard it can be and how everyone blames you, in my case I keep blaming me and DH get's so mad at me for doing that. He's such a good man. I will pray for you and your son tonight, I'm sure he will get it together soon. I wanted to thank all you ladies for your good wishes and prayers for my surgery, you all must of prayed so hard the foob just decided it better get back to were it belonged...lol Thanks 2new1s... Sorry to hear about your dad, will put him on my prayer list too. Hope everything is going better for him. Let us all know how he's doing. Sorry this is so long, guess I just had alot to say...lol Take care & hugs to all, Bee

Posts.Content: Jan 28, 2009 09:28PM Bee54 wrote: I hope nobody minds if I vent alittle while. I have a 25 yr. old son, who has been alot of trouble for me in the years, one thing he won't keep a job. Well, wouldn't you know he ended up getting a girl pregnant and the beautiful baby girl was born April 15th, 2008. I was there for the delivery and her and I fell in love the minute we saw each other. I had her alot when she was a newborn cause the kids just couldn't handle it, I loved every minute but have had alot of health issues along with my 79 yr. old mother, who I love dearly and take care of her( a least I try to do my best). I had the baby on a sunday, a week ago and they called and of couse asked for money, I said no and then, my son and I got to talking and he told me he and his girlfriend were breaking up. the mom(if that's what you can call her, god forgive me) and the baby and her crack-head mother were moving to the next state. Well anyway my son and I got into a fight on the phone and he told me what a sh-tty person I was and hung up on me. Alittle later he called back and my 15 yr. old daughter answered cause I was crying, my son told her that he wanted the baby back right now(which they had originally said I could keep her later so my DH could see her when he got off the road) she said being mad at her brother, not now, he then continued to say they were going to call the police on me. I just thought he was angry, so I started getting the baby ready to go but wasn't in a hurry doing it, when guess what, someone knocked on the door and they did call the cops on me and told them I wouldn't bring the baby home and I was kidnapping her, I couldn't believe it, the policeman seen that I was getting the baby ready to go  but he had to ask me are you taking her home and I said yes, he then went on to tell me that if I wasn't he'd have to arrest me and charge me with kidnapping, I've never been in trouble with the law before in my life, I was so hurt and embarrased. Last week and this week I was suppose to have the baby alot, to spend extra time with her before my surgery (Feb.3), but they haven't got ahold of me and I just found out that the mom, the baby's mom and the baby moved last tues. the 20th and didn't let me know cause they don't want us to know where they are at. I'm so heartbroken, I don't even want to think about my surgery, little lone go through it. I can't seem to function right now and it's only 5 days till my surgery. I cry and I cry did I mention that I'm scared to death over my surgery, with everything on my shoulders I just don't know if I can handle all this. Please pray for my little grandaughter, the people she will be with are not good people, I'm just so scared, I hardly want to go on. Sorry for all of this, I guess that I just needed to get this off my chest, my mom is still sick, so I have to act like everything is ok. ONce again I'm sorry for going on and on. Posts.Content: Nov 12, 2009 08:05PM Bee54 wrote: Hi Feb. girls, I haven't been on for awhile but got on FB & that seems to entertain me well...lol. My foobs have not completely dropped and fluffed yet, still waiting on that..lol I don't like them very well, there too high & i don't like the shape but at least the foobs don't have cancer in them like the real one did. Mine also feel like they get under my arm sometimes, that gets uncomfotable, makes me sore under the arms, they are still too high to suit me and smaller than i expected, just listen to me gripe...lol..sorry I just don't feel very happy with them. I thought i'd let you know my new ( well not really new) thing going on with me. I don't know if you remember that i had thyroid cancer before the breast cancer, i had a check up on it right before my masectomy, some tests done and they found some enlarged nodules but decided to get me through the breast cancer surgery before we do anymore about that, so my doc. didn't forget, 1st appt. with her after mx she sent me for a ct of my neck, this time they could tell that it was thyroid tissue that they didn't get when they took my thyroid out, so off to my cancer doc., he sends me for a body scan to make sure the thyroid cancer hadn't gone anywhere else, thank god it hadn't but still the problem with the tissue they found. Anyway, i had to go off my thyroid meds. so i would get real tired ( which i tried to tell them that i already was real tired...lol), for i don't remember how many weeks they kept me off them but the last three weeks i had to be on a low iodine diet then i went to the hospital for another ablasion, which is a radioactive iodine pill, had to stay away from everyone for about 7 days, which in our small house is hard to do...lol But hopefully it killed all the tissue because with it there , there was a greater chance of the cancer coming back, Whoo, i'm worn out after this big book i just wrote, but it's not over yet,,,lol. I go to my primary doc.she sends me for a chest x-ray, because i have a spot on my lung that they found, in 2007, that sent me for a pet scan, that said the spot was just scare tissue but that's when they found the thyroid cancer, so checking out the scare tissue on the lung they by accident found the thyroid cancer, sorry this is so long, i guess i just need to type this all out to feel better, my self perscribed therapy..lol well my doc. sent me for an x-ray on my lungs to check on the spot & the next day the dreaded phone call, we've scheduled you for a ct scan on your lung, cause i don't know exactly why because the nurse just danced around the question, so once again sorry for the book but i just wanted to tell you what's going on with me, for the last 21/2 years it's just been one thing after another! I know alot of you beautiful ladies have had it alot worse than i have, and i'm not trying to take anything away from that but i guess i'm just frustrated, 21/2 years, hysterectomy, thyroidectomy,masectomy and now what a lungectomy.lol, I just keep thinking the other shoe might have fell! So, i go tomorrow for a ct scan & a mri, which was already scheduled on my hip, pitaful aren't i ????? I know i'm being over dramatic but as you all know when you've been through several scarey things, it sometimes is really hard to not think the worst!!!! Well enough of my ranting, I hope that all of you are doing ok, even though i'm not on here much, i think of you all often & your always in my prayers. BIG,BIG HUGS to all......Bee
